description: This file is a C source file defining functions for managing a linked list of pattern nodes, including insertion, comparison, search, printing, and cleanup routines. It appears to be part of a larger software component for pattern data management.

methods.name: int insertPCNode(GList ** pch,char * pattern,char * header,DType_t dtype,int count,char * data)
methods.description: Inserts a new pattern node at the beginning of the list, duplicating string parameters and setting data based on the specified data type.

methods.name: gint comparePattern(gconstpointer np,gconstpointer sp)
methods.description: Performs a custom comparison to check if the pattern exists within a given string.

methods.name: pcdata_t * searchPCNode(GList * pch,char * pattern)
methods.description: Searches for a pattern node in the list matching a specific pattern.

methods.name: void print_pc_node(gpointer data,gpointer user_data)
methods.description: Debug function that prints details of a pattern node.

methods.name: void printPCNodes(GList * pch)
methods.description: Prints all nodes in the list for debugging.

methods.name: void freePCNode(gpointer node)
methods.description: Frees memory allocated for a pattern node.

methods.name: void clearPCNodes(GList ** pch)
methods.description: Deletes and frees all nodes in the list.

ctags.name: insertPCNode
ctags.pattern: /^int insertPCNode(GList **pch, char *pattern, char *header, DType_t dtype, int count, char *data)$/
ctags.signature: (GList ** pch,char * pattern,char * header,DType_t dtype,int count,char * data)
